MemberApps.Dashboard.nameModeratorsActiv.value: This feature is activated upon request. It allows you to name a member as moderator. Write us a short message and we'll process your request promptly.

MemberApps.Dashboard.sendMessageToFilter.value: The message will be sent to the current selection of members (

MemberApps.Dashboard.sendMessageToMember.value: Send a message to the members

MemberApps.Dashboard.sendMessageToUnfilt.value: The message will be sent to all members (

MemberApps.Dashboard.writeToMembersActiv.value: This feature is activated upon request. It allows an administrator to send a grouped message to a selection of members. Write us a short message and we'll process your request promptly.

MemberApps.Form.GDPRSummary.value: This information will be visible to the agenda moderators.

MemberApps.Form.confirmRemoveInfo.value: If you remove yourself from the agenda, you will stop receiving notifications and will no longer be able to edit your events nor add new events. The agenda will stop appearing in your home screen.

MemberApps.Form.remove.value: I wish to be removed from the agenda

MemberApps.Form.removeFail.value: The request failed. Try again shortly. If this problem persists, send us a short message at support@openagenda.com

MemberApps.Form.removeSuccess.value: You are no longer member of the agenda
